heading: Andreas Linn - Decent Ninja
short_description: Hi! I love to design, implement and iterate on experiences and interactions. Most of my work is in game design and programming. If you find that I am a good fit for your company, please do not hesitate to contact me.

portfolio.description: A fast paced, mood focused, aerial dogfighting game in VR. You are tasked to fly swiftly, in low altitude terrain, during the night. The first thing you will spot from the enemy is the blasting light from their jet engines. Inspired by the FPS game mode Oddball, the one who holds the payload the longest wins. You will, in a flock of other fighters, hunt down the payload holder, shoot him down, take the payload, shake the flock off your tail!
